name: Apple iPad with Retina display 32GB Wi-Fi + Verizon Refurbished
shortDescription: This refurbished Apple iPad features a stunning Retina display, iSight and FaceTime cameras, the all-new A6X chip and ultra-fast wireless. With access to over 275,000 apps on the App Store, you can do more than ever.

name: Apple iPad mini 16GB Wi-Fi Refurbished
shortDescription: This Apple iPad mini 16GB features a beautiful 7.9-inch display, iSight and FaceTime cameras, the A5 chip, ultra-fast wireless and up to 10 hours of battery life. Over 275,000 apps on the App Store made for iPad also work with iPad mini. The Apple iPad mini is an iPad in every way, shape and slightly smaller form.

name: Apple In-Ear Headphones with Remote and Mic
shortDescription: <p>Hear every detail of your music every time you tune in with the Apple In-Ear Headphones with Remote and Mic. These headphones offer pro audio performance and impressive sound isolation. The iPod headphones with remote and convenient buttons make it easy to adjust the volume and control your music without reaching for your iPod. You can also plug it into your iPhone and use the built in mic as a convenient hands-free way to talk on the phone. With the Apple In-Ear Headphones with Remote and Mic, you'll be able to catch every word with the high-quality clarity of the earbuds. Switch seamlessly from listening to your favorite music to talking to people on the phone. In addition, the sleek, intuitively ergonomic design of the Apple Headphones with Remote and Mic offers an appealing style.</p>

name: Apple iPod Shuffle 2GB, Black, 4th Gen
shortDescription: The iPod shuffle is jaw-droppingly small andenormously colorful. And even more brilliant,the VoiceOver feature tells you whatsong is playing and who's performing it.It can even tell you the names of yourplaylists, so you can easily find one tomatch your mood. With VoiceOver — andwith the controls conveniently locatedon the earphone cord — it's even easierto navigate your music. And you canbrowse without taking your eyes offyour run, your ride, or whatever you'redoing. Clip a 2GB iPod shuffle toyour sleeve, running shorts, or backpackand take up to 500 songs whereveryou go.

name: Apple iPod nano 8GB, Black, 5th Gen
shortDescription: The iPod nano 5th generation now has a built-in videocamera that lets you spontaneouslyshoot video wherever you are. Andthat's just the beginning. It has adramatic, polished anodized aluminumfinish and a larger screen. The newGenius Mixes feature acts as yourpersonal DJ, automatically searchingyour iTunes library, then making mixesyou'll love. Take iPod nano 5th generation anywhereand the new pedometer counts yoursteps. Also making its debut: a built-inFM radio with two amazing features —iTunes Tagging and Live Pause. So theworld's most popular music player nowhas more to play with.

name: Apple iPod Classic 160GB 7th Gen Black
shortDescription: With 160GB of storage, iPod classic can hold up to 40,000 songs, 200 hours of video or 25,000 photos. And it does it all in style — available in quintessential silver or striking black.

name: Apple iPod Classic 160GB 7th Gen (Silver)
shortDescription: Now you can take it with you. All of it. The silver Apple iPod classic 160GB comes with enough storage space to make it the take-everything everywhere iPod. It holds up to 40,000 songs, 200 hours of video, 25,000 photos, or any combination. Available in quintessential silver or striking black, the iPod classic 7th generation catches your eye with its classic, all-metal enclosure composed of anodized aluminum and polished stainless steel. The Genius playlist feature creates an on-the-fly playlist of tracks in your library that go great with the song you're listening to. And Cover Flow lets you flip through your music by album artwork. Discovering new music, movies, TV shows, games, audio books, and podcasts is easy on the iTunes Store. You can even rent a movie from iTunes. To get everything into your pocket, just connect the silver Apple iPod classic 160GB to your Mac or PC, and iTunes transfers your music and more in one seamless sync.

name: Apple iPod Touch 32GB
shortDescription: iPod touch is a great iPod, a greatpocket computer, and a great portablegame player. The new 32GB model is up to 50 percentfaster than the previous generation.It includes the latest 3.1software, which offers new featureslike peer-to-peer gaming, Genius Mixes,and Genius recommendations for apps.

name: Apple iPod nano 16GB (Gray)
shortDescription: <p>'Clip on' music to your sleeve or jacket with the Apple iPod nano 16GB. It has a multi-touch display with larger icons that makes it easier to access all its functions. Just give the iPod a shake and it will play a random song from your music library. The built-in accelerometer helps you stay fit by tracking your workouts. Turn this iPod nano with multi-touch into a wristwatch and choose from the eighteen clock face designs to reflect your mood and style. The built-in FM tuner with Live Pause, along with Genius Mixes and playlists, ensures that you listen to new and fresh music every time. Powered by a built-in rechargeable battery, this iPod can provide you with up to 24 hours of non-stop music. With a memory capacity of 16GB, this Apple 6th generation iPod nano lets you store all your favorite tracks. Available in silver, this iPod nano is sure to capture your imagination.</p>

name: Apple iPod touch 8GB with FaceTime Camera and Retina Display (Black)
shortDescription: The world's most popular portable gaming device is now even more fun. Listen to your favorite albums. Send text messages over Wi-Fi with iMessage on the Apple 8GB iPod Touch. Record HD video. Make FaceTime calls. The Apple 8GB iPod Touch even works with iCloud, which stores your content and pushes it to all your devices.

name: Apple iPod touch 4th Generation 32GB (Black)
shortDescription: The world's most popular portable gaming device is now even more fun. Listen to your favorite albums on the 4th Generation Apple iPod. Send text messages over Wi-Fi with iMessage. Record HD video. Make FaceTime calls. Apple iPod Touch 4th Generation 32GB even works with iCloud, which stores your content and pushes it to all your devices.

name: Apple iPod shuffle 2GB, (Assorted Colors)
shortDescription: Introducing the new, colorful, clip-and-go 2GB Apple iPod shuffle. Its buttons give you an easy way to play your music. With a press of the Apple iPod shuffle's VoiceOver button, you can hear the song's title and artist, playlist menu, or battery status. And this new 2GB Apple iPod shuffle holds hundreds of songs, multiple playlists, and Genius Mixes, so you can always have the perfect music for every mood.

name: Apple iPod nano 8GB 6th Gen
shortDescription: Redesigned for music and Multi-Touch, the sixth generation Apple iPod nano, in 8GB or 16GB, is smaller and lighter than ever, and is so much more than just an MP3 player. You can clip it to your sleeve, jacket, or running shorts and keep your favorite songs at your fingertips — along with the Genius feature, a built-in FM radio, pedometer, and more. And the anodized aluminum finish in six bright colors makes this new Apple iPod nano player even more brilliant.<br><br><b>Apple iPod nano 6G, 8GB or 16GB</b>:<ul><li>1.5-inch Multi-Touch color display with 240-by-240-pixel resolution</li><li>Innovative Multi-Touch user interface</li><li>Newest generation is 46 percent smaller and 42 percent lighter</li><li>Built-in volume controls</li><li>Built-in clip</li><li>Built-in FM radio with Live Pause</li><li>Built-in pedometer</li><li>Up to 24 hours of music playback</li></ul>

name: Apple iPod nano 16GB (Charcoal)
shortDescription: Listen to your favorite tunes at home or on the go with the Apple iPod Nano 16GB (Charcoal). Featuring a small, sleek design, this product easily clips anywhere and goes everywhere. Its 1.5-inch Multi-Touch color display screen with 240-by-240-pixel resolution has larger icons than earlier models and is even easier to use. Designed with an active lifestyle in mind, this workout iPod Nano has built-in fitness features to keep you on track towards your fitness goals. The walk and run app support allows you to track your workouts and stay motivated with each step you take. With this touchscreen iPod, you can choose from 18 different clock face designs to match your mood. If you ever get tired of the music uploaded to your player, you can always use the built-in FM tuner with Live Pause, along with Genius Mixes and playlists to freshen your tunes.

name: Apple iPad with Wi-Fi (Choice of 16GB, 32GB, 64GB)
shortDescription: Introducing the Apple iPad with Wi-Fi. It's the best way to experience the web, email, photos, and video. All on a big, beautiful Multi-Touch screen. With just the touch of a finger.

name: Apple iPad with Wi-Fi + 3G (Choice of 16GB, 32GB, 64GB)
shortDescription: Introducing the iPad with Wi-Fi + 3G. It's the best way to experience the web, email, photos, and video. All on a big, beautiful Multi-Touch screen. With just the touch of a finger.

name: Apple iPad with Wi-Fi (Choice of 16GB, 32GB, 64GB)

name: Apple iPod nano 16GB (Orange)
shortDescription: Listen to your favorite tunes and podcasts at home or on the go with the Apple iPod nano 16GB. It is small and sleek, making it easy to clip to your clothing or bag. This vibrant orange iPod features a 1.5" Multi-Touch color display with pixel resolution of 240 by 240. Its Multi-Touch screen has larger icons and is even easier to use than previous models. Eighteen different lock face designs allow you to easily turn this touch-screen iPod nano into a wristwatch that matches your mood. The built-in fitness features can help keep you active by tracking your workouts while keeping you motivated with each step. A built-in FM tuner with Live Pause, along with Genius Mixes and playlists, ensures that your music is always fresh. The Apple iPod nano 16GB is Mac and PC compatible and comes with Apple stereo earphones.

name: Apple iPad 2 with Wi-Fi (Black, 32GB)
shortDescription: The all-new thinner and lighter design makes the Apple iPad 2 with Wi-Fi even more comfortable to hold. It's even more powerful with the dual-core A5 chip, yet has the same 10 hours of battery life. With two cameras, you can make FaceTime video calls, record HD video, and put a twist on your snapshots in Photo Booth. And the iPad Smart Cover attaches magnetically and wakes up, stands up, and brightens up your Apple iPad 2 black.<br>

name: Apple iPad Smart Cover for iPad 2, Leather
shortDescription: The Apple iPad 2 Smart Cover was designed alongside iPad 2 to be its perfect match: A thin, durable folding iPad cover that magnetically aligns for a perfect fit. It automatically wakes your iPad when you open it. And it folds into a handy stand for reading, watching, and typing.

name: Apple iPad Smart Cover for iPad 2, Leather
shortDescription: The Apple iPad 2 Smart Cover was designed alongside iPad 2 to be its perfect match: A thin, durable folding iPad cover that magnetically aligns for a perfect fit. It automatically wakes your iPad when you open it. And it folds into a handy stand for reading, watching, and typing.

Make FaceTime calls.  iPod touch even works with iCloud, which stores your content and pushes it to all your devices.

name: $25 iTunes Code (email delivery)
shortDescription: iTunes Codes. Perfect for anyone who enjoys apps, games, music, movies, TV shows, books, and more. Use iTunes Codes on the App Store, iTunes Store, the iBooks Store and the Mac App Store in just a few clicks. Choose the place to enjoy: iPhone, iPad, iPod, Apple TV, Mac, or PC. <br>iPad, iPod, Apple TV, Mac, or PC.

name: Apple Airport Express Base Station
shortDescription: Introducing the new Apple Airport Express Base Station, now with 802.11n wireless. Easily create a wireless network at home. Enjoy your iTunes music library in virtually any room of your house using the Apple Airport Express Base Station. Share a USB printer without obtrusive cables. And do it all with the latest wireless technology via the Apple Airport Express Base Station.

name: Apple Airport Extreme Base Station 802.11N, 5th Generation
shortDescription: <p>The sleek, easy-to-use Apple Airport Extreme Base Station 802.11N 5th Generation with simultaneous dual-band support is the perfect wireless access point for home, school or a small business. This wireless networking router supports RADIUS authentication and time-based access control. Wi-Fi protected access (WPA/WPA2), WEP and NAT firewall ensure data security and confidentiality. You can connect a DSL or cable modem via the 1GB Ethernet WAN port that is present in this 802.11n Wi-Fi router. Connect computers and network devices to the 3GB Ethernet LAN port and a USB printer or external hard drive via the USB 2.0 port. This Apple Airport Extreme Base Station 802.11N 5th Generation offers fast, 802.11n Wi-Fi access for Mac computers, PCs and Wi-Fi devices such as the iPhone, iPod touch and Apple TV. This Apple Airport Extreme Base Station 802.11N 5th Generation comes with an AirPort Extreme Base Station and power supply cord.</p>

name: Apple iPad 3rd Generation 32GB with Wi-Fi + 4G LTE AT&T
shortDescription: <b>The new iPad</b><p>With the breakthrough Retina display, 5-megapixel iSightcamera, and ultrafast wireless, the new iPad with Wi-Fi is more immersivethan ever before. Surf the web, check your email, flip throughphotos, watch a movie, play a game, thumb through a book ormagazine, and more. This 32GB iPad gives you a smarter, more intuitive,more fun way to do everyday things — and thanks to 200,000apps in the App Store, things you can't even imagine. This black 32GB iPad has a built-in 42.5-watt-hour rechargeable lithium-polymer battery, and boasts up to 10 hours of surfing the web on Wi-Fi, watching video, or listening to music.</p>

This 64GB Wi-Fi iPad gives you a smarter, more intuitive,more fun way to do everyday things — and thanks to 200,000apps in the App Store, things you can't even imagine. name: Apple iPod nano 16GB Refurbished
shortDescription: <p>Redesigned for music and Multi-Touch, the sixth generation Apple iPod nano 8GB, (also available in 16GB), is smaller and lighter than ever, and is so much more than just an MP3 player. You can clip the Apple iPod Nano 8GB to your sleeve, jacket, or running shorts and keep your favorite songs at your fingertips — along with the Genius feature, a built-in FM radio, pedometer, and more. And the anodized aluminum finish in six bright colors makes this new Apple iPod Nano 8GB 6th Generation (Assorted Colors) even more brilliant.<br><br><strong>Apple iPod nano 6G, 8GB or 16GB</strong>:</p><ul><li>1.5-inch Multi-Touch color display with 240-by-240-pixel resolution</li><li>Innovative Multi-Touch user interface</li><li>Newest generation is 46 percent smaller and 42 percent lighter</li><li>Built-in volume controls</li><li>Built-in clip</li><li>Built-in FM radio with Live Pause</li><li>Built-in pedometer</li><li>Apple iPod Nano 8GB provides up to 24 hours</li></ul>

name: Apple iPod classic 160GB Refurbished
shortDescription: With 160GB of storage, iPod classic can hold up to 40,000 songs, 200 hours of video or 25,000 photos. And it does it all in style — available in quintessential silver or striking black.

name: Apple iPod Shuffle 6th Generation 2GB (Assorted Colors) Refurbished
shortDescription: <p>Introducing the new, colorful, clip-and-go Apple iPod Shuffle 2GB. Its buttons give you an easy way to play your music. With a press of the 2GB iPod Shuffle's (available in assorted colors) VoiceOver button, you can hear the song's title and artist, playlist menu, or battery status. And this new Apple iPod Shuffle 2GB holds hundreds of songs, multiple playlists, and Genius Mixes, so you can always have the perfect music for every mood.</p>

name: Apple Smart Cover for iPad - Black Leather
shortDescription: <p>The Apple Smart Cover for iPad gives your iPad durable protection while maintaining the device's thin and light design, so it will still fit easily in your hand, purse or bag. This Leather Cover for iPad transforms into a stand for typing, surfing the web, watching video or making Facetime calls, while also having the ability to sit upright and elevate it to a comfortable typing position. Using this Black Leather Case for iPad is simple as it attaches magnetically and aligns for a seamless fit. The Apple Smart Cover for iPad also keeps your screen clean with a microfiber lining that buffs smudges and fingerprints.</p>

name: Apple Smart Case for iPad - Assorted Colors
shortDescription: This Apple Smart Case for iPad comes in assorted colors and was created to maintain the thin and light design of the iPad while still keeping it safe. This iPad Smart Case protects your iPad without covering up its durable and sleek aluminum back. This Apple Smart Case for iPad attaches magnetically and aligns for a smooth fit while covering the device securely and firmly. This Apple iPad Smart Cover stays slim, so you can still easily fit your iPad in your hand, purse or bag even with the cover.

name: Apple Smart Case for iPad - Assorted Colors
shortDescription: This Apple Smart Case for iPad comes in assorted colors and was created to maintain the thin and light design of the iPad while still keeping it safe. name: Apple Smart Cover for iPad - Blue
shortDescription: The Apple Smart Cover for iPad - Blue has a slim, yet very durable design to help keep your iPad stored neatly and safely. The Apple Cover for iPad allows you to easily carry the device with you while on the go and still maintain the light and thin design that you originally get with the iPad. The Apple Smart Case attaches magnetically and has a smooth alignment to protect the device while on the go.

name: Apple Digital AV Adapter
shortDescription: Always be ready to plug your device into a screen for instant presentations and viewings with this portable Apple Digital Adapter. This short cable, measuring about 2.6 inches long, allows you to put your slides, movies, photos and pretty much everything else that fills your iPad screen on an even bigger screen. This AV adapter has the ability to mirror exactly what you see on your iPad 2 so that everyone in the room can also enjoy it on your widescreen TV, video projection screen or other HDMI-compatible display. It also supports video out for your iPad, iPhone 4 or 4th generation iPod touch. This Apple adapter is a practical and super handy cable to always keep in your bag. It will also make a functional gift for your favorite college student or professional on the go.

name: Apple iPod nano 16GB
shortDescription: The redesigned, ultraportable iPod nano has a larger, 2.5-inch Multi-Touch display; plays music, FM radio and videos; includes built-in Bluetooth technology; and features a pedometer and Nike+ support for fitness.

name: Apple iPod touch 32GB  (Assorted Colors)
shortDescription: iPod touch is more fun than ever. It has an ultrathin design, a 4-inch Retina display, a 5MP iSight camera, iOS 7, Siri, iMessage, FaceTime, iTunes and the App Store, iTunes Radio, and more.

name: Apple iPod touch 64GB
shortDescription: iPod touch is more fun than ever. It has an ultrathin design, a 4-inch Retina display, a 5MP iSight camera, iOS 7, Siri, iMessage, FaceTime, iTunes and the App Store, iTunes Radio, and more.

name: Apple iPod nano 16GB
shortDescription: Listen to your favorite music and other audio wherever you go with the Apple iPod Nano 16GB. It is redesigned to be ultra-portable and has a larger 2.5" multi-touch display for easier navigation of features to select songs, adjust volume and more. The device plays not only your stored music but also receives FM radio signals so you can hear your favorite local broadcasts. With 16GB of storage, the iPod nano multi-touch holds plenty of songs, as well as video. Bluetooth technology enables wireless pairing with portable speakers and other compatible devices. A built-in pedometer keeps track of fitness activity, such as steps and calories burned throughout the day. It also syncs to the Nike+ website to challenge friends. Made of anodized aluminum, the Apple iPod 16GB is available in a selection of colors. The rechargeable battery offers up to 30 hours of playback on a full charge for long periods of listening to music, audiobooks and more.

name: iPod touch 64GB (Assorted Colors)
shortDescription: With an ultrathin design, a 4-inch Retina display, a 5-megapixel iSight camera on the 32GB and 64GB models, iTunes and the App Store, Siri, iMessage, FaceTime, Game Center and more — it's the most fun iPod touch ever.

name: Apple iPod shuffle 2GB
shortDescription: Take your favorite tunes with you on-the-go with this Apple iPod Shuffle 2GB. It is designed to hold hundreds of songs so you always have a large selection to choose from. A small, wearable design makes it ideal to use while driving, working out and much more. It is easy to use with the clickable control pad. With just the simple tap of the VoiceOver button, you can hear the song title, the playlist name and even the battery status. It works with MAC and PC systems for versatile use. This small music player supports multiple playlists along with Genius mixes to expand your musical capacity. It has a small anodized aluminum design and it comes in many colors. A USB cable and earphones are included. The built-in clip makes it simple to transport and keeps it secure while you are on the move. Play your music, audiobooks and podcasts with ease and enhanced sound with this Apple iPod 2GB.

shortDescription: iPod touch is more fun than ever. It has an ultrathin design, a 4-inch Retina display, a 5MP iSight camera, iOS 7, Siri, iMessage, FaceTime, iTunes and the App Store, iTunes Radio, and more.

name: iPod touch 32GB  (Assorted Colors)
shortDescription: With an ultrathin design, a 4-inch Retina display, a 5-megapixel iSight camera on the 32GB and 64GB models, iTunes and the App Store, Siri, iMessage, FaceTime, Game Center and more - it's the most fun iPod touch ever. <br><br> This iPod touch features a 6-millimetre ultrathin design and a brilliant 4-inch Retina display. The 5-megapixel iSight camera on the 32GB and 64GB models lets you take stunning photos, even in panorama, or record 1080p video. Discover music, movies and more from the iTunes Store or browse apps and games from the App Store. And with iOS 6 - the world's most advanced mobile operating system - you get Siri, iMessage, Facebook integration, FaceTime, Game Center and more.
